name: Original Inc.
description: Developer of a body measurement platform designed to analyze the whole body using artificial intelligence (AI) technology. The company's platform predicts a person's body shape and size under their clothing using photos taken by a user against any background, enabling users with not only size recommendations but also detailed fit information to understand exactly how a garment will fit and why it was recommended.
one_liner: Developer of a body measurement platform designed to analyze the whole body using artificial intelligence (AI) technology. The company's platform predicts a person's body shape and size under their clothing using photos taken by a user against any background, enabling users with not only size recommendations but also detailed fit information to understand exactly how a garment will fit and why it was recommended.
